name: miniLockLib
description: Do miniLock encryption operations on a web page of your own.
author: 45678 <undefined@undefined>

scripts.annotate: docco --output website/annotated_code --template website/annotated_code.html.jst --css website/stylesheet.css library/*.coffee tests/*.coffee
scripts.start: make; npm run annotate; wr 'make; npm run annotate;' */*.coffee website/*.jst
